## Automation and visualization of flow cytometry data analysis pipelines

[![Project Status: Active â€“ The project has reached a stable, usable
state and is being actively
developed.](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/active.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#active)
[![codecov.io](https://codecov.io/github/UCLouvain-CBIO/CytoPipelineUtils/coverage.svg?branch=main)](https://codecov.io/github/UCLouvain-CBIO/CytoPipelineUtils?branch=main)
[![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-GPL3.0-blue)](https://opensource.org/licenses/GPL-3.0)

### What is CytoPipelineUtils?

`CytoPipelineUtils` is meant to be used in conjunction with
`CytoPipeline` package (see
[here](https://github.com/UCLouvain-CBIO/CytoPipeline)), which provides
support for automation and visualization of flow cytometry data analysis
pipelines. `CytoPipelineUtils` provides a series of wrapper
implementations that can in turn be defined as CytoProcessingSteps in
CytoPipeline. It is therefore a helper package, which is aimed at
hosting wrapper implementations of various functions of various
packages.

`CytoPipelineUtils` is open to contributions. If you want to implement
your own wrapper of your favourite pre-processing function and use it in
a `CytoPipeline` object, this is the place to do it! If you do so,
please issue a [pull
request](https://github.com/UCLouvain-CBIO/CytoPipelineUtils/pulls).

### License

The `CytoPipelineUtils` code is provided under [GPL license version 3.0
or higher](https://opensource.org/licenses/GPL-3.0). The documentation,
including the manual pages and the vignettes, are distributed under a
[CC BY-SA 4.0 license](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`addFlowJoGatesInfo()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/addFlowJoGatesInfo.md)
  : add FlowJo manual gates membership information to a flow frame
- [`anonymizeMarkers()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/anonymizeMarkers.md)
  : anonymizing some markers of a flowFrame
- [`applyFlowJoGate()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/applyFlowJoGate.md)
  : perform manual gating from a FlowJo gate
- [`getEventNbFromFJGates()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/getEventNbFromFJGates.md)
  : perform manual gating from a FlowJo gate
- [`getFlowJoLabels()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/getFlowJoLabels.md)
  : Process a flowjo workspace file
- [`qualityControlFlowClean()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/qualityControlFlowClean.md)
  : perform QC with flowClean
- [`qualityControlFlowCut()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/qualityControlFlowCut.md)
  : perform QC with flowCut
- [`removeDeadCellsDeGate()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/removeDeadCellsDeGate.md)
  : remove dead cells from a flowFrame
- [`removeDebrisFlowClust()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/removeDebrisFlowClust.md)
  : remove debris from a flowFrame, using flowClust
- [`removeDebrisFlowClustTmix()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/removeDebrisFlowClustTmix.md)
  : remove debris from a flowFrame, using flowClust
- [`removeDoubletsFlowStats()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/removeDoubletsFlowStats.md)
  : remove doublets from a flowFrame, using flowStats
- [`removeDoubletsPeacoQC()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/removeDoubletsPeacoQC.md)
  : remove doublets from a flowFrame, using PeacoQC
- [`removeMarginsFlowAI()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoPipelineUtils/reference/removeMarginsFlowAI.md)
  : remove margin events, using flowAI
